ema kottasayata tharaga kala janatha wimukthi peramune piyasena pranandu janda 566 k labagath athara, hitapu nagaradhipathiwarayakuda wu eksath jathika pakshayen tharaga kala apekshakayata labagatha hakiwuye janda 472 k pamani. “1956 di lanka samasamaja pakshayen panadura aasanayata tharaga karapu lesli gunawardhana mahaththaya piligena thamayi mama deshapalanayata aawe” bibisi sinhala sewaya samaga sanwadayakata ekwemin piyasena pranandu siya deshapalana diwiye aarambhaya gana adahas dakwiya.

ee wenuwata, thamange niyoga yatathe kriyathmaka kerunu nawika hamuda wishesha buddhi eekakaye piris wisin karana lada aparadha ohu wisin sithamathama sangawa athayi da, ema aparadha sidukala pudgalayan nithiya hamuwata nopamunuwa aaraksha kara athayi da aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa chodana karayi.

idiriyedi pawathwimata niyamitha kabinat sanshodhanayedi amathya arjuna ranathunga mahatha waraya amathya dhurayen iwathkara ee sandaha aacharya sarath amunugama mahatha path kirimata yojana wi athayi 'shri lanka mirar' wetha warthawe.
manmath wana sulu ya..
aadaraya yanu minisata suwaya ha sanasima laba dena ata midulu thulata ka wadina hangimaki.
minimarimak salasum kirima, polisiyata tharjanaya kirima saha rajyaye katayuthuwalata madihathwime chodana matha pakisthanaye nawa mas hawiridi bilindekuta erehiwa nadu pawara thibe.
goliya wasangathaya, kamkaru panthiye salakiya yuthu kotas thula samajawadi hangim saha satankamithwaye rallak athi kara thibe.
”ape amma ehema patu widihata hithanne na.”
kisidu manushyayekuta dewa kamaththata wiruddhawa kisidu thiranayak ganimata ho kisidu deyak kirimata hakiyawak natha.
ee mathu dinayaka thrimana rupawahiniyak sathu kara gath dinayakaya...
winadi dahayak athule siyalu kariya siddha wunath, eyin dedenama dawasak thisse ekathu wela sathutu wena tharamatama sathutu wuna.
me anuwa apata rasa sanskruthiyak pawathinawa.

eheth hembirissawedi mathuwana roga lakshana hembirissawa suwa wimath samanga ibema nathiwi yayi.pinas roga lakshana wanne nasaye hotu diyara galima, kiwisum yama, nasaya hirawima, muhune saha oluwe bara gathiya, ganda suwanda danime gataluya.pinasa athi ayakuta nasayen galanne awarna diyaramaya shrawayaki.

matath me 120yi 255yi gihilla dan epa wela
